El nombre es obligatorio y debe contener: The name is required and must contain only letters up to a maximum of 30.
No se tomó asistencia a los alumnos marc: No assistance was given to students marked with red
Error, se eligió un día domingo. Los dom: Error, it was chosen on a Sunday. Sundays there are no classes
Error, usted no eligió ningún alumno: Error, you did not select any students
Error, usted no eligió ninguna materia: Error, you did not choose any stuff
Error, en el aula elegida no se dictan c: Error, in the chosen classroom there are no classes today
El código esta borroso o la cámara no ca: The code is blurry or the camera does not correctly capture the same
Error, usted no eligió ningún aula: Error, you did not choose any classroom
Error, usted no eligió ningún profesor: Error, you did not choose any teacher
Error, usted no tiene materias cargadas: Error, you have no loaded materials
Error, no hay asistencias cargadas para: Error, there are no assists charged for this matter
Que te parecio la Aplicacion: What did you think about the application
Te gustaria que salga una nueva version: Would you like a new version to come out
¿Qué desea realizar?: What do you want to do?
¿Desea eliminar la Materia?: Do you want to eliminate matter?
Por favor, complete todos los campos ant: Please complete all fields before recording
Verifique los datos ingresados o comuniq: Verify the entered data or communicate with support
Verifique que los password sean iguales: Verify that the password is the same
¿Desea eliminar el usuario?: Do you want to delete the user?
¿Cómo desea tomar la foto?: How do you want to take the photo?
Desde aqui podras gestionar tus tareas a: From here you can manage your administrative tasks
Desde aqui podras ver todas tus ausencia: From here you can see all your absences in each subject you study
Desde aqui podras tomar asistencia a los: From here you will be able to take care of the students of your class
recuerde que debe ser un mail valido y u: Remember that it must be a valid email and a password of at least 6 characters
readme:
TOAST

Npm install toast

* Moment: When the user saves an attendance.
* Reason: To make the interaction more visually appealing.

--------------------------------------

VIBRATION

Npm install --save @ ionic-native / vibration

* Moment: When the user saves an attendance.
* Reason: To allow to receive a tactile confirmation.

--------------------------------------

AUDIO

Npm install @ ionic-native / native-audio

* Moment: When the user saves an attendance.
* Reason: For the user to hear that the assistance was saved correctly.
* Moment: When the user makes a mistake.
* Reason: For the user to keep in mind his mistake.

--------------------------------------------

DEVICE MOTION

Npm install @ ionic-native / device-motion

* Moment: When the student is reviewing their attendance and shakes the cell phone near and away from his face.
* Reason: So that the student can easily reset his choices and clean the screen.

--------------------------------------------

DEVICE

Npm install @ ionic-native / device

* Moment: When the user enters the assistance module, the OS, version, manufacturer of the cell phone and model is saved.
* Reason: So that the developers can keep record of the population that constitutes the users of the app.

----------------------------------------------

CAMERA

$ Ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-camera
$ Npm install --save @ ionic-native / camera

* Moment: When the user enters the people module, and modifies or creates a user
* Reason: So that the user can upload his photo

----------------------------------------------

BARCODE SCANNER

$ Ionic cordova plugin add phonegap-plugin-barcodescanner
$ Npm install --save @ ionic-native / barcode-scanner

* Moment: When the administrative wants to select a classroom.
* Reason: To save work to the administrative and allow an alternative way to select the classroom.

-------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------

TRANSLATE

* Moment: Throughout the application.
* Reason: To adapt the application to the user's language.

----------------------------------------------

GOOGLEMAP

* Moment: When entering the location submenu.
* Reason: To visually display the regional format change.

----------------------------------------------


OTHERS

Npm install email-validator
Npm install firebase angularfire2 --save

----------------------------------------------IONIC VIEW  * 0ead0d31
TEXTOPRUEBA: The UTN, like the rest of the national public universities in Argentina, their degrees are free (financially dependent on the national state, although it is autonomous), free and secular. Being autonomous, it has its own system of government, formed from the University Reform of 1918 by representatives of professors, students, graduates and non-teaching staff. The freedom of professorship promotes more than one that dictates each subject, selecting the teachers through a mechanism of competition and evaluation by jurors.
